sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from "react"; import { Breadcrumb, Button, ButtonGroup, Row, Col, InputGroup, Form, Image, Dropdown, Card, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faHome, faPlus, faCog, faCheck, faSearch, faSlidersH, faLink, faList } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; function Users() { const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); // update search value const updateSearch = e => { setSearch(e.target.value); } // get search results const getSearch = e => { e.preventDefault(); setQuery(search); } // fetch results when query changes useEffect(() => { setIsLoaded(false); fetch(`/__xpr__/pub_engine/react-admin/element/users_json?q=${query}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then( (result) => { setIsLoaded(true); setUsers(result); }, (error) => { setIsLoaded(true); setError(error); } ) }, [query]); return ( <>
Dashboard
Show 10 20 30 Show 10 20 30
{users.map(u => ( ))} { error &&
Fetching users error: {error.message}
} { !isLoaded && }
Name Email Position User Created at
{u.FirstName && u.LastName ? u.FirstName+" "+u.LastName : "Anonymous"}
{u.Email || "-"}
{u.CompanyName || "-"}
 {u.LastLogin || "long ago"}
Loading...
) } export default Users;
